sentences: Vesna Stefanovich-Gruppman is a violin and viola professor at the Rotterdam Conservatory (CODARTS), a position she has held since 2006.
Stefanovich was born in Serbia which was then part of Yugoslavia.

Vesna Stefanovich's solo career began when she was still a teenager, receiving First Prize at the Jaroslav Koci√°n International Violin Competition and becoming the first artist to win the National Violin Competition in her native Yugoslavia six times in a row.
In 2002, the American String Teachers Association honoured Vesna Stefanovich-Gruppman with the "Colleague Teacher of the Year" award.
Gruppman was a professor at Brigham Young University and a founding member of the Orchestra at Temple Square which is currently conducted by her husband Igor.
